qas.question: Why was Mayor Bob Filner asked to resign?
How many women claimed to be sexually harassed by Filner?
When did a mediation process begin between Filner and a city representative?
How long did Filner's trial last?
Why was Mayor Bob Filner asked to re-sign for longer?
How many men claimed to be sexually harassed by Filner?
When did a mediation process begin between Filner and a county representative?
How long did Filner's term last?

context: In July 2013, three former supporters of Mayor Bob Filner asked him to resign because of <a0_0><b5_0>allegations of repeated sexual harassment<b5_0/><a0_0/>. Over the ensuing <a4_0><b9_0>six weeks<b9_0/><a4_0/>, <a1_0><b6_0>18<b6_0/><a1_0/> women came forward to publicly claim that Filner had sexually harassed them, and multiple individuals and groups called for him to resign. On <a3_0><b8_0>August 19<b8_0/><a3_0/> Filner and city representatives entered a mediation process, as a result of which Filner agreed to resign, effective August 30, 2013, while the city agreed to limit his legal and financial exposure. Filner subsequently pleaded guilty to one felony count of false imprisonment and two misdemeanor battery charges, and was sentenced to <a2_0><b7_0>house arrest and probation<b7_0/><a2_0/>.
